00031 void Tests::sizeXsizeLoopsLoadClean(Scene* scene, const int loops = 10, const int size = 10)
00032 {
00033         wxString str;
00034         str << wxT("Memory Test (sizeXsizeLoopsLoadClean) is starting!\n");
00035         str << wxT("Prepare Taskmanager now, and wait...\n");
00036         str << wxT("DO NOT CLICK OVER COVER THE APP!\n\n");
00037         str << loops << wxT(" loops, cubes ") << size << wxT(" x ") << size;
00038         wxMessageBox(str);
00039 
00040         for (int h = -loops/2; h<loops/2+1; ++h)
00041         {
00042                 for (int i = -size/2; i<size/2+1; ++i)
00043                 {
00044                         for (int j = -size/2; j<size/2+1; ++j)
00045                         {
00046                                 //build importer and load jumbo
00047                                 //OaxImport in(wxT("data\\apple-ibook-2001.oax"));
00048                                 OaxImport in(wxT("data\\cube_green_1x1.oax"));
00049                                 //get assembly
00050                                 Assembly* dummy = in.getAssembly();
00051                                 //move dummy around
00052                                 dummy->setX(i*1.0);
00053                                 dummy->setZ(j*1.0);
00054                                 //insert in scene
00055                                 scene->insertAssembly(dummy);
00056                         }
00057                 }
00058                 scene->newRoom();
00059         }
00060 
00061         wxMessageBox(wxT("FERTIG!"));
00062         scene->newRoom();
00063 }

00071 void Tests::loadTieFighter(Scene* scene, const int loops = 10)
00072 {
00073         wxString str;
00074         str << wxT("Memory Test (loadTieFighter) is starting!\n");
00075         str << wxT("Prepare Taskmanager now, and wait...\n");
00076         str << wxT("DO NOT CLICK OVER COVER THE APP!\n\n");
00077         str << loops << wxT(" loops, tie fighters ");
00078         wxMessageBox(str);
00079 
00080         for (int h = 0; h<loops; ++h)
00081         {
00082                 OaxImport in(wxT("data\\Tie Fighter.oax"));
00083                 //get assembly
00084                 Assembly* dummy = in.getAssembly();
00085                 //insert in scene
00086                 scene->insertAssembly(dummy);
00087                 //clean now
00088                 scene->newRoom();
00089         }
00090 
00091         wxMessageBox(wxT("FERTIG!"));
00092         scene->newRoom();
00093 }
